position: Exploring | Hiranandani Group and Venture Catalysts

experience.title: Senior Investment Analyst
experience.description: ➡️Spearhead the investment process by comprehensively understanding startups across various sectors, formulating investment thesis, and successfully raised 550 million.➡️Actively engaged in fundraising activities, convincing existing and prospective angel investors to secure capital for promising startups in the D2C, Logistics, EV, Drone, Blockchain, Healthtech and Insurtech segments.➡️Facilitated pitch days for over 40 startups, attracting the participation of 8,000+ angel investors.➡️Played a key role in developing detailed investment note breaking down complex business models.➡️Proactively connect portfolio companies with 30+ larger VC firms and family offices to explore future funding rounds and potential acquisitions
